name: datetimepicker
description: Responsive flat design jQuery DateTime Picker plugin for Web & Mobile

scripts.dist-js: cat src/DateTimePicker.js | tee dist/DateTimePicker.js | node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs -mc > dist/DateTimePicker.min.js
scripts.dist-css: cat src/DateTimePicker.css | tee dist/DateTimePicker.css | node_modules/.bin/cleancss -o dist/DateTimePicker.min.css
scripts.dist: npm run dist-js && npm run dist-css
